dublinCore.dc:title: 119 S3022 IS: Save Our Seas 2.0 Marine Debris Infrastructure Programs Reauthorization Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Sullivan (for himself and Mr. Whitehouse) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works

form.official-title: To amend the Save Our Seas 2.0 Act to reauthorize certain Environmental Protection Agency programs, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Save Our Seas 2.0 Marine Debris Infrastructure Programs Reauthorization Act.

section.header: Reauthorization of EPA programs to combat plastic waste
section.text: Section 302(g) of the Save Our Seas 2.0 Act (33 U.S.C. 4282(g)) is amended, in each of paragraphs (1) and (2)â€”

paragraph.text: by inserting in after described; and
